## getText() function

Get the text content of a given DOM Element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getText(page: Page, selector: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | The puppeteer page handle. |
|  selector | string | Query selector. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

Text content of the selected element.
